name: Morbus Inferos
description:
Fight your way through ominous, mutant-infested environments as you try to escape from the high-tech lab your'e being held within in this immersive action horror game.

Morbus Inferos is a short prototype game developed as a final year university project that we decided to pulish.

Created by: Austin Beck, James Yeung, Lachlan Connell and Lucy Robertson-Bell
